All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AluBat
Represents the main projectile of the boss class Alucard.
Alucard
Represents the boss enemy "Alucard" in the game.
CompleteOrb
 
CustomFont
A utility class for loading custom fonts from a TrueTypeFont (TTF) file.
DeadPits
A class representing pits that instantly kill the player on contact.
Enemy
Abstract class representing an enemy entity in the game.
Food
 
Game
The main class that initializes and manages the game.
GameFrame
The main frame class for the game, extending JFrame
GameLevel
Abstract class representing a level in the game.
GameView
The main view class for the game handling drawing graphics to the foreground/background, extending UserView.
GiveFocus
 
Goblin
Represents a goblin enemy in the game.
GoldBag
 
GoldCoin
 
Level1
Represents the first level of the game.
Level2
Represents the second level of the game.
Level3
Represents the third and final level of the game.
Pickups
An abstract class representing pickups in the game.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
ScoreManager
The score handling class for managing player gold and preserving it on level changes.
Skeleton
Represents a skeleton enemy in the game.
Stan
The main player character class.
StanAnimation
The main animation handling class for the player's actions.
StanCollision
Class responsible for handling player collision detection (with other objects)
StanController
The Main Class responsible for controlling player actions through keyboard input.
StanTracker
A class responsible for tracking the player's position and making the "camera" follow the player.
Torch
 
Whip
Represents the whip object that is spawned each time the player attacks.
WhipHandler
Controls the behavior of the spawned whip object used in the player's attack hitbox.
